005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.AbstractDataTypeProvider;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IMarkupItem;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.IAtomicOrUnionType;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.qname.EQNameFactory;
013
014import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
015
016/**
017 * Provides for runtime discovery of built-in implementations of the markup
018 * Metaschema data types.
019 */
020public final class MarkupDataTypeProvider
021    extends AbstractDataTypeProvider {
022  /**
023   * The Metaschema <a href=
024   * "https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#markup-line">markup-line</a>
025   * data type instance.
026   */
027  @NonNull
028  public static final MarkupLineAdapter MARKUP_LINE = new MarkupLineAdapter();
029  /**
030   * The Metaschema <a href=
031   * "https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#markup-multiline">markup-multiline</a>
032   * data type instance.
033   */
034  @NonNull
035  public static final MarkupMultilineAdapter MARKUP_MULTILINE = new MarkupMultilineAdapter();
036
037  /**
038   * The Metaschema data type that represents all markup types.
039   */
040  @NonNull
041  public static final IAtomicOrUnionType<IMarkupItem> MARKUP_TYPE
042      = IAtomicOrUnionType.of(
043          IMarkupItem.class,
044          IMarkupItem::cast,
045          EQNameFactory.instance().newQName(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH, "markup"));
046
047  /**
048   * Create the data type provider.
049   */
050  public MarkupDataTypeProvider() {
051    register(MARKUP_LINE);
052    register(MARKUP_MULTILINE);
053
054    // register abstract types
055    register(MARKUP_TYPE);
056  }
057}
